description: After completing this Project, you can change your specialization to "Bloodmage".\n\nThe Bloodmage is a deranged spellcaster who is willing to do anything to overcome his foes - even at the cost of his own creatures' lives. This menacing spellcaster is adept at manipulating the lifeforce of allies and foes alike in his endless pursuit for power.
name: Specialization: Bloodmage
